title: Ival Thano Lyrics Marumunai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ival Thano 
Singer(s): Aalaap Raju
Movie: Marumunai
Music: Sathya Dev

Ival thano margazhi
illa nenjil panithuli.
Nagaraamal nirkudhey,
nanaikindra manithuli.

Kadal theendum vaanamaai
en nenjam maarudhey.
Alaiyaaga aasaigal
avalmeedhu modhudhey.

Azhagaana rathiri
aval koondhal mudiyudhey.
Aval paarkum paarvayil adivaanam
vidiyudhey.

Sorgathin thangam saavi ivalaa.

Ival thano margazhi
illa nenjil panithuli.
Nagaraamal nirkudhey,
nanaikindra manithuli.

Uyir mazhaithuliyaai
udal mayiliragaai
ival ennai thaandi
sellum podhu midhakiradhey.
pala jenmangalaai 
ival madiyiniley
naan vazhindirundha 
niyabagangal udhikiradhey.

Aval nadandhu vara
ennai thodarndhu vara
En nenjukule nadhaswwram olikkiradhey
aval kadhal mugam kandu rasipadharkku
andha venilavil jannal ondru thirakiradhey

Kadal theendum vaanamaai
en nenjam maarudhey.
Alaiyaaga aasaigal
avalmeedhu modhudhey.

Ival paadham thodum pasum pullveligal
pani mutham vaithu mutham vaithu
silirkiradhey

Ival viralgal edhu vanna malargal edhu
thendral kuzhapathil nindru nindru
thigaikiradhey.

Oru muyal kuttiyaai
indha chella kuttiyayai
kai alli kondu sendruvida thudikiradhey

Idhu kanavugalaa illai ninaivugalaa
en kannirandil thaenthuligal thelikiradhey.

Azhagaana rathiri
aval koondhal mudiyudhey.
Aval paarkum paarvayil adivaanam
vidiyudhey.

Ival thano margazhi
illa nenjil panithuli.
Nagaraamal nirkudhey,
nanaikindra manithuli.

Kadal theendum vaanamaai
en nenjam maarudhey.
Alaiyaaga aasaigal
avalmeedhu modhudhey.

Azhagaana rathiri
aval koondhal mudiyudhey.
Aval paarkum paarvayil adivaanam
vidiyudhey.

Sorgathin thangam saavi ivalaa.
